skills.name: Void Shift
skills.blurb: When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage. Damage from lane minions is unaffected.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Malzahar''' receives ''Void Shift'' if he hasn't taken non-{{tip|minion}} damage nor been affected by {{tip|crowd control}} in the last {{pp|30;24;18;12|1;6;11;16}} seconds.

''Void Shift'' phases out '''Malzahar''', rendering him {{tip|Cc-immune|immune to crowd control}} and causing him to take 90% {{tip|Damage reduction|reduced}} damage, lingering for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after taking damage or negating a {{tip|crowd control}} effect.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Malzahar receives Void Shift if he hasn't taken non-minion damage nor been affected by crowd control in the last 1;6;11;16 â€’ undefined seconds.
Void Shift phases out Malzahar, rendering him immune to crowd control and causing him to take 90% reduced damage, lingering for 0.25 seconds after taking damage or negating a crowd control effect.
skills.notes:
* ''Void Shift'' will not resist allied {{tip|crowd control}} nor will it be deactivated by them.
* '''Malzahar''' receives ''Void Shift'' upon respawning.
* ''Void Shift'' will not mitigate {{tip|true damage}} but the buff will still be consumed.
** It does not deactivate against the {{tip|Nexus Obelisk}}.
* {{tip|Shield|Shields}} will take priority over ''Void Shift'', but the buff will still be consumed (does not reduce damage inflicted). ''Void Shift'' triggers even if the shield negated the damage entirely.
** However, if '''Malzahar''' has a {{tip|spell shield}} and the {{tip|shield}} fully mitigates the damage, ''Void Shift'' does not trigger.{{bug}} The damage taken must be from an effect that cannot be negated by ''spell shields''.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} take priority over ''Void Shift''. If the triggering hostile ability does not contain a {{tip|crowd control}} effect, both ''Void Shift'' and the ''spell shield'' break simultaneously.
** Since ''spell shields'' are precedent over ''Void Shift'', applied {{tip|crowd control}} from effects that cannot be blocked by ''spell shields'' (i.e. {{ai|Wall of Pain|Karthus}}) will also ignore ''Void Shift'' despite its {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immunity}}. The effect must not damage '''Malzahar''' for this event to take place.
* ''Void Shift'' will specifically not deactivate if '''Malzahar''' eats {{ui|Honeyfruit}} or is within a hostile {{ii|Frozen Heart}} passive [[aura]].

skills.name: Call of the Void
skills.blurb: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Malzahar''' opens two portals to the void at the target location that are each 200 units away from each other perpendicular to his facing, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area in between. After {{fd|0.4}} seconds, all enemies between the portals are dealt {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|silence|silenced}} for a duration.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Malzahar opens two portals to the void at the target location that are each 200 units away from each other perpendicular to his facing, granting sight of the area in between. After 0.4 seconds, all enemies between the portals are dealt magic damage and silenced for a duration.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 65% AP)
  • Silence Duration:

skills.name: Void Swarm
skills.blurb: Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Malzahar''' gains a stack of ''Zz'Rot Swarm'' when he casts another [[champion ability|ability]], up to a maximum of 2.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Malzahar''' consumes all ''Zz'Rot Swarm'' stacks and, after a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, summons a {{ui|Voidling}} at the target location. Additional ''Voidlings'' are then summoned for each ''Zz'Rot Swarm'' stack consumed.

''Voidlings'' deal {{as|magic damage}} with their attacks. ''Voidlings'' deal 50% reduced damage to epic [[monster]]s and 200% increased damage to enemy {{tip|minions}} infected by {{ai|Malefic Visions|Malzahar}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Malzahar gains a stack of Zz'Rot Swarm when he casts another champion ability, up to a maximum of 2.
Active: Malzahar consumes all Zz'Rot Swarm stacks and, after a 0.5-second delay, summons a Voidling at the target location. Additional Voidlings are then summoned for each Zz'Rot Swarm stack consumed.
Voidlings deal magic damage with their attacks. Voidlings deal 50% reduced damage to epic monsters and 200% increased damage to enemy minions infected by Malzahar's Malefic Visions.
skills.notes:
* '''Malzahar''' loses all [[stack]]s upon [[death]].
* ''Zz'Rot Swarm'' stacks are gained per cast and not per ability activation. For example, if {{ai|Malefic Visions|Malzahar}} is cast and the ability cancels under certain circumstances, a ''Zz'Rot Swarm'' stack will still be granted despite the ability's failure to complete.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: 5+3.5*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))undefined âˆ’ (based on level) (+ ) (+ 40% bonus AD) (+ 20% AP)

skills.name: Malefic Visions
skills.blurb: Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions. If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Malzahar''' infects the target enemy's mind, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds over 4 seconds, which refreshes upon damaging them with {{ai|Call of the Void|Malzahar}} or {{ai|Nether Grasp|Malzahar}}.
If the target dies while infected, they spread ''Malefic Visions'' onto the closest nearby enemy and '''Malzahar''' restores {{sti|mana|{{as|2% of his '''maximum''' mana}}}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Malzahar infects the target enemy's mind, dealing them magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 4 seconds, which refreshes upon damaging them with Malzahar's Call of the Void or Malzahar's Nether Grasp.
If the target dies while infected, they spread Malefic Visions onto the closest nearby enemy and Malzahar restores 2% of his maximum mana.
leveling: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 220}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|80/8 to 220/8}} {{as|(+ {{fd|10%}} AP)}}}}
skills.notes: * If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, dies, or '''Malzahar''' loses {{tip|sight}} of them during the cast time, ''Malefic Vision'' cancels but its {{sti|cooldown}} and {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} are refunded.

effects.str:
• Total Magic Damage: (+ 80% AP)
  • Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 10% AP)

skills.name: Nether Grasp
skills.blurb: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Malzahar''' forms a {{tip|tether}} between him and the target enemy {{tip|champion}}, {{tip|knockdown|knocking them down}}. '''Malzahar''' then {{tip|channel|channels}} for up to {{fd|2.5}} seconds, {{tip|suppression|suppressing}} and {{tip|true sight|revealing}} the target and dealing them {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
'''''Malzahar''' will continue to channel so long as the tether is not broken, even if the suppression is removed.''

A ''Null Zone'' is opened beneath the target's location at the time of cast that lasts 5 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds to all enemies within, capped at 120 per tick against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.
''Null Zone will persist even if the channel is interrupted.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Malzahar forms a tether between him and the target enemy champion, knocking them down. Malzahar then channels for up to 2.5 seconds, suppressing and revealing the target and dealing them magic damage every 0.25 seconds.
Malzahar will continue to channel so long as the tether is not broken, even if the suppression is removed.
A Null Zone is opened beneath the target's location at the time of cast that lasts 5 seconds, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to all enemies within, capped at 120 per tick against minions and monsters.
''Null Zone will persist even if the channel is interrupted.
leveling: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|125 to 275}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}|Damage Per Quarter-Second|{{ap|125/10 to 275/10}} {{as|(+ 8% AP)}}}}

{{st|Total Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|10 to 20}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Damage Per Tick|{{as|{{ap|10/10 to 20/10}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.25}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
skills.notes:
* Applies {{tip|persistent damage}} for the [[tether]] and {{tip|persistent area damage}} to enemies within the ''Null Zone''.
* The tether will not break if the target enters a {{tip|zombie state}} or enters {{tip|resurrection}}.
* Removing the {{tip|suppression}} will also remove the {{tip|true sight|reveal}}.
* ''Nether Grasp'' and ''Null Zone'' count as two different abilities for effects such as {{ri|Electrocute}}.
* '''Malzahar''' places himself onto the ground and interrupts {{tip|airborne|displacements}} affecting him upon starting the channel.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Malzahar''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=Disabled if attacking Nether Grasp target. Otherwise interrupts after {{fd|0.5}} seconds of channeling.|cast=interrupts|move=Disabled for the first {{fd|0.5}} seconds. Interrupts afterwards.|consume=true|items=interrupts,true,interrupts,false,interrupts|spells=true,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts}}
